plot: Samantha has an agenda: to promote her HR Speak to everyone who enters the HR Department of Entitlement Magazine. But does this agenda truly contribute to a more inspired work environment, or is it just meaningless gibberish?
title: HR Speak
plot_es: Samantha has an agenda: to promote her HR Speak to everyone who enters the HR Department of Entitlement Magazine. But does this agenda truly contribute to a more inspired work environment, or is it just meaningless gibberish?
plot_en: Samantha has an agenda: to promote her HR Speak to everyone who enters the HR Department of Entitlement Magazine. But does this agenda truly contribute to a more inspired work environment, or is it just meaningless gibberish?
